languages.text: Если влага "закаляет", то мой дух уже сварился.

traits.locale_text: Если влага "закаляет", то мой дух уже сварился.

languages.text: "Все из-за Звездн{rt_mf|ого|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дина|жи} — стоило гостям с неба явиться, как все с ума посходили, даже мутанты поганые! Столько зевак погибло..."
"All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."
languages.original_text: "Все из-за Звездн{rt_mf|ого|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дина|жи} — стоило гостям с неба явиться, как все с ума посходили, даже мутанты поганые! Столько зевак погибло..."

traits.locale_text: "All because of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."
"All because of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."
"All because of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."
"All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."
"All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

languages.text: "Alles nur wegen {rt_mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} – als die Besucher vom Himmel erschienen, haben alle durchgedreht, sogar die Mutanten! Viele Umstehende sind gestorben ..."
languages.original_text: "All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

traits.locale_text: "Alles nur wegen {mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} – als die Besucher vom Himmel erschienen, haben alle durchgedreht, sogar die Mutanten! Viele Umstehende sind gestorben ..."

languages.text: « Tout ça à cause de Sa Céleste Seigneurie... Il a suffi que les visiteurs venus du ciel apparaissent pour que tout le monde devienne fou, même les mutants ! Quand je pense à toutes ces pauvres victimes innocentes... »
languages.original_text: "All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ça à cause de Sa Céleste Seigneurie... Il a suffi que les visiteurs venus du ciel apparaissent pour que tout le monde devienne fou, même les mutants ! Quand je pense à toutes ces pauvres victimes innocentes... »

languages.text: “这一切都是因为来自上界的大人。那些来自天上的客人出现之后，所有人都发了疯，就连变种人也发了疯！死了那么多看热闹的人……”
languages.original_text: "All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是因为来自上界的大人。那些来自天上的客人出现之后，所有人都发了疯，就连变种人也发了疯！死了那么多看热闹的人……”
“这一切都是因为来自上界的大人。那些来自天上的客人出现之后，所有人都发了疯，就连变种人也发了疯！死了那么多看热闹的人……”

languages.text: «Y todo por {rt_mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial. En cuanto llegaron los visitantes del cielo, todo el mundo se volvió loco, ¡hasta los mutantes! Han muerto un montón de curiosos...».
languages.original_text: "All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

traits.locale_text: «Y todo por {rt_mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial. En cuanto llegaron los visitantes del cielo, todo el mundo se volvió loco, ¡hasta los mutantes! Han muerto un montón de curiosos...».

languages.text: 「すべては天の{rt_mf|君|姫}のせいだ。空からの客人が現れて以来、みんなおかしくなった。変異体まで狂い出したよ！大勢の野次馬が死んじまった…」
languages.original_text: "All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

traits.locale_text: 「すべては天の{rt_mf|君|姫}のせいだ。空からの客人が現れて以来、みんなおかしくなった。変異体まで狂い出したよ！大勢の野次馬が死んじまった…」

languages.text: "Bunların hepsi Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} yüzünden. Gökten gelenler ortaya çıkınca insanları geç, mutantlar bile kafayı sıyırdı! O kadar çok masum insan öldü ki..."
languages.original_text: "All because of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} — when the visitors from the sky appeared, everyone went crazy, even the mutants! So many onlookers died..."

traits.locale_text: "Bunların hepsi Semavi {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} yüzünden. Gökten gelenler ortaya çıkınca insanları geç, mutantlar bile kafayı sıyırdı! O kadar çok masum insan öldü ki..."
